H0.text: What type of creature is a sea fox. Vulpes maritima

H1.text: What type of creature is a sea fox. Selachimorpha

H2.text: What type of creature is a sea fox. Odontaspis

H3.text: What type of creature is a sea fox. Alopias

A4.text: The smalltooth sand tiger or bumpytail ragged-tooth (Odontaspis ferox) is a species of mackerel shark in the family Odontaspididae.
